data.message: I don't like that there is message filtering. I would like the option to have filtering turned off. I just found out that I lost a prize that I won from a page I like because the message that I needed to respond to was in my "other" folder and I didn't know it because of course no notification. I finally won something and thanks to this stupid feature I don't get my prize.

replies.message:
Hi Karen. You can change your filter settings right from your inbox. For more information, please visit: http://on.fb.me/VOlfXd
-Chantal
I have one question, I need help. How I can change the order of albums?

But I can't change it for all messages to go to inbox. There are only two choices and that isn't one. If the other folder and the fact that there are messages in it was more noticeable that would help. There were two other messages in it that were more than 6 months old and I never noticed them there.
It only sucks if you don't remember waiting on a letter to come in mail.
get a life and get off the computer
